mapper.select: SELECT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.selectFutureCarRegDtl*/ YEAR(A.year) as year, A.episd, E.name, (SELECT ID FROM CO_MEM_MST WHERE MEM_SEQ = B.MEM_SEQ) as id, E.email, E.hp_no, E.tel_no, E.gndr, E.birth, B.appctn_seq, B.reg_id, B.reg_dtm , B.mod_id, B.mod_dtm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = D.theme_cd) as theme_cd_nm, C.rsume_ord, -- 서류 단계 -- C.rsume_stts_cd, -- 서류 상 C.appctn_stts_cd, -- 신청자 신청 상태값 C.appctn_stts_chng_dtm, -- 신청자 신청 수정일 C.mng_stts_cd, -- 관리자 확인 상태값 C.mng_stts_chng_dtm, -- 관리자 확인 수정일 D.rsume_seq, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(TMMBR_SEQ) AS COMBINED_TMMBR_SEQ FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_PRIZE_CAR_TMMBR_DTL WHERE RSUME_SEQ = D.RSUME_SEQ) AS tmmbrSeqList, D.name AS rdName, D.hp_no AS rdHpNo, D.email AS rdEmail, D.schl_nm AS rdSchlNm, D.grd AS rdGrd, D.grd_cd AS rdGrdCd, D.theme_cd, D.dtl_cntn, D.wdcrm_cd, D.ptcpt_type, D.hghst_winer_yn, F.file_seq, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = D.ptcpt_type) as ptcpt_type_nm FROM ( SELECT * FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = 'INQ07011' ) A INNER JOIN cx_appctn_mst B ON B.episd_seq = A.episd_seq INNER JOIN cx_appctn_rsume_dtl C on C.appctn_seq = B.appctn_seq INNER JOIN cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl D on D.rsume_seq = C.rsume_seq INNER JOIN co_mem_mst E on E.mem_seq = B.mem_seq LEFT JOIN cx_appctn_file_dtl F on F.appctn_seq = B.appctn_seq WHERE B.APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey} AND C.RSUME_ORD = 1 ;

SELECT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.selectFutureCarRsumeDtl*/ RSUME_ORD , APPCTN_SEQ , APPCTN_STTS_CD , APPCTN_STTS_CHNG_DTM , MNG_STTS_CD , MNG_STTS_CHNG_DTM FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl WHERE RSUME_SEQ = #{rsumeSeq};

SELECT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.getRegisterCompanyCount*/ count(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = 'INQ07011' ) A INNER JOIN cx_appctn_mst B ON B.episd_seq = A.episd_seq INNER JOIN( SELECT appctn_seq, MAX(rsume_ord) AS max_rsume_ord, rsume_seq, appctn_stts_cd , mng_stts_cd FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl GROUP BY appctn_seq )C on C.appctn_seq = B.appctn_seq INNER JOIN cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl D on D.rsume_seq = C.rsume_seq
select /*WBKBRegisterMapper.getRegisterCompanySubList*/ name, hp_no, email from cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl where rsume_seq = #{rsumeSeq}

SELECT /*WBKBREGISTERMAPPER.getRegisterFirstResultList*/ appctn_stts_cd AS fResultCd, (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd = a.appctn_stts_cd) AS fResultNm FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL a WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = #{appctnSeq} AND RSUME_ORD = 2;

SELECT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.getRegisterCompanyDetailSubList*/ A.rsume_stts_cd, (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = A.rsume_stts_cd) as rsume_stts_nm, A.appctn_stts_chng_dtm, A.mng_stts_chng_dtm, A.mod_id, A.mod_dtm FROM (SELECT * FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl WHERE appctn_seq = #{appctnSeq}) A LEFT JOIN cx_appctn_rsume_task_dtl B ON A.rsume_seq = B.rsume_seq AND A.rsume_ord = B.rsume_ord ORDER BY A.rsume_ord DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.getOptYearList*/ DISTINCT YEAR(year) FROM cx_episd_mst WHERE bsn_cd = #{bsnCd} ORDER BY year ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.putAppctnMst*/ INTO cx_appctn_mst ( appctn_seq, episd_seq, mem_seq, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{appctnSeq}, #{episdSeq}, #{memSeq}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE /*WBKBRegisterMapper.updAppctnMst*/ cx_appctn_mst SET episd_seq = #{episdSeq}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE appctn_seq = #{detailsKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.selectFutureCarRegDtl*/ INTO cx_appctn_rsume_file_dtl ( rsume_seq, rsume_ord, file_cd, file_seq, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{rsumeSeq}, #{rsumeOrd}, #{fileCd}, #{fileSeq}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )
mapper.delete: DELETE /* WBKBRegisterMapper.delFile */ FROM cx_appctn_file_dtl WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey};
DELETE /* WBKBRegisterMapper.delDtlFile */ FROM cx_appctn_rsume_file_dtl WHERE RSUME_SEQ = #{rsumeSeq} AND RSUME_ORD = #{rsumeOrd} AND FILE_CD = #{fileCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.putDtlFileDtl*/ INTO cx_appctn_rsume_file_dtl ( rsume_seq, rsume_ord, file_cd, file_seq, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{rsumeSeq}, #{rsumeOrd}, #{fileCd}, #{fileSeq}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )

INSERT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.putAppctnRsumeDtl*/ INTO cx_appctn_rsume_dtl ( rsume_seq, rsume_ord, appctn_seq, rsume_stts_cd, appctn_stts_cd, appctn_stts_chng_dtm, mng_stts_cd, mng_stts_chng_dtm, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{rsumeSeq}, #{rsumeOrd}, #{appctnSeq}, #{rsumeSttsCd}, #{appctnSttsCd}, now(), #{mngSttsCd}, now(), #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )

INSERT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.putAppctnRsumeTaskDtl*/ INTO cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl ( rsume_seq, rsume_ord, name, hp_no, email, schl_nm, grd, grd_cd, theme_cd, dtl_cntn, wdcrm_cd, hghst_winer_yn, ptcpt_type, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{rsumeSeq}, 1, #{rdName}, #{rdHpNo}, #{rdEmail}, #{rdSchlNm}, #{rdGrd}, #{rdGrdCd}, #{themeCd}, #{dtlCntn}, #{wdcrmCd}, #{hghstWinerYn}, #{ptcptType}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE /*WBKBRegisterMapper.updAppctnRsumeTaskDtl*/ cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl SET NAME = #{rdName}, HP_NO = #{rdHpNo}, EMAIL = #{rdEmail}, SCHL_NM = #{rdSchlNm}, GRD = #{rdGrd}, GRD_CD = #{rdGrdCd}, THEME_CD = #{themeCd}, DTL_CNTN = #{dtlCntn}, WDCRM_CD = #{wdcrmCd}, PTCPT_TYPE = #{ptcptType}, HGHST_WINER_YN = #{hghstWinerYn}, MOD_ID = #{modId}, MOD_IP = #{modIp}, MOD_DTM = now() WHERE RSUME_SEQ = #{rsumeSeq}

UPDATE /*WBKBRegisterMapper.updRsumeStep*/ cx_appctn_rsume_dtl SET APPCTN_STTS_CD= #{appctnSttsCd}, appctn_stts_chng_dtm = now(), mng_stts_cd= #{mngSttsCd}, mng_stts_chng_dtm= now(), REG_ID= #{modId}, REG_IP= #{modIp}, REG_DTM= now() WHERE RSUME_SEQ = #{rsumeSeq} AND RSUME_ORD = #{rsumeOrd}
mapper.delete: DELETE /*WBKBRegisterMapper.delRsumeNestStep*/ FROM cx_appctn_rsume_dtl WHERE RSUME_SEQ = #{rsumeSeq} AND RSUME_ORD = #{rsumeOrd} + 1
mapper.insert: INSERT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.insertRsumeStep*/ INTO cx_appctn_rsume_dtl ( RSUME_SEQ, RSUME_ORD, APPCTN_SEQ, APPCTN_STTS_CD, appctn_stts_chng_dtm, mng_stts_chng_dtm, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_DTM ) VALUES ( #{rsumeSeq}, #{rsumeOrd} + 1, #{appctnSeq}, #{appctnSttsCd}, now(), now(), #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )

INSERT /*WBKBRegisterMapper.putPartDtl*/ INTO cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_tmmbr_dtl ( rsume_seq, rsume_ord, tmmbr_seq, name, hp_no, email, schl_nm, grd, grd_cd, reg_id, reg_ip, reg_dtm ) VALUES ( #{rsumeSeq}, 1, #{tmmbrSeq}, #{name}, #{hpNo}, #{email}, #{schlNm}, #{grd}, #{grdCd}, #{regId}, #{regIp}, now() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE /*WBKBRegisterMapper.updPartDtl*/ cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_tmmbr_dtl SET
NAME = #{name}, HP_NO = #{hpNo}, EMAIL = #{email}, SCHL_NM = #{schlNm}, GRD = #{grd}, GRD_CD = #{grdCd}, MOD_ID = #{modId}, MOD_IP = #{modIp}, MOD_DTM = now() WHERE tmmbr_seq = #{tmmbrSeq}
UPDATE /*WBKBRegisterMapper.updCoMemMst*/ co_mem_mst SET tel_no = #{telNo}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_ip = #{modIp}, mod_dtm = now() WHERE id = #{name}

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND ( B.REG_DTM BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR B.REG_DTM >= STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE( #{endDt} , '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) )

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND ( B.REG_DTM BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR B.REG_DTM >= STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE( #{endDt} , '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) )

if.test: strtDt != null and strtDt != ''.toString() and endDt != null and endDt != ''.toString()

when.if: AND ( B.MOD_DTM BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') OR B.MOD_DTM >= STR_TO_DATE(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE( #{endDt} , '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) }

choose.when: AND EXISTS (SELECT NAME FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_PRIZE_CAR_TMMBR_DTL WHERE RSUME_SEQ = D.RSUME_SEQ AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
AND EXISTS (SELECT REG_ID FROM CX_APPCTN_MST WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = B.APPCTN_SEQ AND (REG_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR REG_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
AND EXISTS (SELECT MOD_ID FROM CX_APPCTN_MST WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = B.APPCTN_SEQ AND (MOD_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR MOD_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')))
choose.otherwise: AND ( EXISTS (SELECT NAME FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_PRIZE_CAR_TMMBR_DTL WHERE RSUME_SEQ = D.RSUME_SEQ AND (NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%'))) OR EXISTS (SELECT REG_ID FROM CX_APPCTN_MST WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = B.APPCTN_SEQ AND (REG_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR REG_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%'))) OR EXISTS (SELECT MOD_ID FROM CX_APPCTN_MST WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = B.APPCTN_SEQ AND (MOD_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR MOD_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%'))) )

mapper.select: SELECT /* WBKBRegisterMapper.checkAppctnRsumeSeq */ DISTINCT(RSUME_SEQ) FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey};

SELECT /* WBKBRegisterMapper.checkAppctnRsumeDtl */ COUNT(*) FROM CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL WHERE RSUME_ORD = 1 AND (MNG_STTS_CD IS NULL OR MNG_STTS_CD = '') AND APPCTN_SEQ IN
#{appctnSeq} ;
mapper.delete: DELETE /* WBKBRegisterMapper.deleteCarRegAppctnMst */ FROM cx_appctn_mst WHERE APPCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey};
DELETE /* WBKBRegisterMapper.deleteCarRegAppctnDtl */ FROM cx_appctn_rsume_prize_car_dtl WHERE RSUME_SEQ = #{rsumeSeq};
